title: Kahan Shuru Kahan Khatam
overview: Meera is about to get married against her wishes and she decides to escape on the wedding day. On the run now, she bumps into a serial wedding crasher, who reluctantly decides to help her and the two develop an unlikely bond. Meanwhile, Meeraâ€™s family come to look for her and the chaos ensues when the circumstances make it seem like she has run away with him.
